amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the Non-Defense Environmental Cleanup account under the Department of Energy by $10 million and reduce the Weapons Activities account under the National Nuclear Security Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Non-Defense Environmental Cleanup account under the Department of Energy by $10 million and reduce the Weapons Activities account under the National Nuclear Security Administration by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 257 (Roll no. 574).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 257 (Roll no. 574).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Matheson.
